entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 10:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
